column4: ok i have 2 gig of ram so i have been told that i can should limit my swap file to 1 gb
swap is used as additional RAM. If you have plenty you do not need more than 1 GB swap. But if you want to hibernate all your RAM then you need as much swap as you have RAM.
minimum install is 4 GB, but if you are going to install other things, then I suggest 15 or 20 GB.
